main.java.questfortheabodeth

Class Helper

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.questfortheabodeth.Helper

  • public class Helper
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains functions that are required in multiple places throughout the game and do not modify the games state but instead perform caclulations. These methods are all static

      Helper()

        public static void stopAllAudio()
